citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
After completing the animal portion of the inspection with the owner, the facility representatives informed me records were
not available until the computer was repaired. Records were only stored digitally. APHIS officials must be allowed to
examine the records required to be kept by the Act and the regulations in this part.
Correct by: May 16, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
After completing the animal portion of the inspection with the owner, the facility representatives informed me records were 
not available until the computer was repaired. Records were only stored digitally. APHIS officials must be allowed to 
examine the records required to be kept by the Act and the regulations in this part.  
 
Correct by: May 16, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative. 
 
 n
